static member TryGetSourcePayloadAsUTF8String : System.Cloud.Messaging.MessageContext * string -> bool

Docs.param: The to store the resultant payload as .
Docs.summary: Gets the message payload obtained from as .
Docs.remarks: Implementation copied from public override unsafe string ToString() method of BinaryData. No special treatment is given to the contents of the data, it is merely decoded as a UTF-8 string. For a JPEG or other binary file format the string will largely be nonsense with many embedded NUL characters, and UTF-8 JSON values will look like their file/network representation, including starting and stopping quotes on a string.
